boxes.name: Barbarian
boxes.text: The Barbarian is a kilt-clad Scottish warrior with an angry, battle-ready expression, hungry for destruction. He has Killer yellow horseshoe mustache.

boxes.name: Archer
boxes.text: The Archer is a female warrior with sharp eyes. She wears a short, light green dress, a hooded cape, a leather belt and an attached small pouch.

boxes.name: Giant
boxes.text: Slow, steady and powerful, Giants are massive warriors that soak up huge amounts of damage. Show them a turret or cannon and you'll see their fury unleashed!

boxes.name: Goblin
boxes.text: These pesky little creatures only have eyes for one thing: LOOT! They are faster than a Spring Trap, and their hunger for resources is limitless.

boxes.name: Wizard
boxes.text: The Wizard is a terrifying presence on the battlefield. Pair him up with some of his fellows and cast concentrated blasts of destruction on anything, land or sky!
